<meta name="description" content="Hoppy Hour Starts NOW! Crisp, zingy, and hoppily refreshing, our Hoppy Refresher is made using everything we know about hops. It's a big splash of flavor that’s surprisingly fruity. But it's more than just a night extender or a sparkling water - it goes perfectly with or without some spirits!" />

yoast_head_json.description: Hoppy Hour Starts NOW! Crisp, zingy, and hoppily refreshing, our Hoppy Refresher is made using everything we know about hops. It's a big splash of flavor that’s surprisingly fruity. But it's more than just a night extender or a sparkling water - it goes perfectly with or without some spirits!

@graph.name: Cheers to Hop-tails – Lagunitas
@graph.description: Hoppy Hour Starts NOW! Crisp, zingy, and hoppily refreshing, our Hoppy Refresher is made using everything we know about hops. It's a big splash of flavor that’s surprisingly fruity. But it's more than just a night extender or a sparkling water - it goes perfectly with or without some spirits!
